This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(lme4)
```

```{r}
player_expertise = read.table(file = '../data/outputs/player_expertise.tsv', sep = '\t', header = TRUE)
```

```{r}
boundless_data <- player_expertise[ which(player_expertise$era =='boundless'), ]
head(boundless_data)
```

```{r}
ggplot(boundless_data, aes(n_life, age)) + geom_smooth(model = age ~ n_life)
```

```{r}
ggplot(boundless_data, aes(gametime, age)) + geom_smooth(model = age ~ gametime ) 
```
